org.shared.net.filter

Class XmlFilterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.net.filter.XmlFilterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Filter<Element,ByteBuffer>, FilterFactory<Filter<Element,ByteBuffer>,Element,ByteBuffer,ConnectionHandler<?>>

    public class XmlFilterFactory
extends Object
implements FilterFactory<Filter<Element,ByteBuffer>,Element,ByteBuffer,ConnectionHandler<?>>, Filter<Element,ByteBuffer>
    An implementation of FilterFactory for reading and writing XML DOM Elements.
